functionDecorators.name: claimAndSwapToStable
functionDecorators.description: claimAndSwapToStable allows a user to claim their processed 3CRV from a redeemBatch and directly receive stablecoins. The _stableCoinIndex must align with the index in the curve three-pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchId
parameterDecorators.description: Defines which batch gets withdrawn from.

parameterDecorators.name: _stableCoinIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Defines which stablecoin the user wants to receive.

parameterDecorators.name: _min_amount
parameterDecorators.description: The min amount of stables which should be returned by the curve three-pool (slippage control).

functionDecorators.name: setApprovals
functionDecorators.description: set idempotent approvals for 3pool and butter batch processing.

functionDecorators.name: zapIntoBatch
functionDecorators.description: zapIntoBatch allows a user to deposit into a mintBatch directly with stablecoins. The amounts in _amounts must align with their index in the curve three-pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: An array of amounts in stablecoins the user wants to deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _min_mint_amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The min amount of 3CRV which should be minted by the curve three-pool (slippage control).

functionDecorators.name: zapOutOfBatch
functionDecorators.description: zapOutOfBatch allows a user to retrieve their not yet processed 3CRV and directly receive stablecoins. The _stableCoinIndex must align with the index in the curve three-pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchId
parameterDecorators.description: Defines which batch gets withdrawn from.

parameterDecorators.name: _stableCoinIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Defines which stablecoin the user wants to receive.

parameterDecorators.name: _min_amount
parameterDecorators.description: The min amount of stables which should be returned by the curve three-pool (slippage control).
